title: Calories in In-N-Out Patty
meta_description: Discover in n out patty calories: one grilled beef patty has 250 kcal, plus full macros, protein, fat details, and variations for your burger.
assumptions: Standard grilled 100% beef patty from In-N-Out (2 oz cooked weight), no bun, toppings, or condiments.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by patty size, cooking method, and restaurant preparation. Check In-N-Out's official info or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out beef patty provides 250 kcal and 20 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out patty?
faqs.a: One standard beef patty has about 250 kcal.

faqs.q: What is the protein in In-N-Out patty calories breakdown?
faqs.a: 20 g protein per patty, with 17 g fat and 0 g carbs.
Yes, 0 g carbs and 0 g fiber per patty.

faqs.q: How much sodium in an In-N-Out patty?
faqs.a: Approximately 370 mg sodium per grilled patty.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect In-N-Out patty calories?
faqs.a: Grilling adds minimal calories; variations like added fat could increase by 20-50 kcal.
